# About:
Gepwc is a python version of linux tool **wc**, it performs many different tasks. 

# Installation:

```bash
pip install gepwc
gepcat -V
```
# How to use:
### Calculate four necessary calculations:
```
gepwc <filename>
```
Use ``gepwc --help`` to get all useful commands.
